title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: When searching for references to a specific field in an external jar (Build 200201151), the search results are not selected properly. To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below.
OB: When double-clicking on the search result, observe that the first match is not selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 set as the default JRE (and ensure you have the source for rt.jar).
2. Open the java.io.File class.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Perform the search for references to this field.
